metadata.title: CVE-2021-3622 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the hivex library. This flaw allows an attacker toinput a specially crafted Windows Registry (hive) file, which would causehivex to recursively call the _get_children() function, leading to a stackoverflow. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to systemavailability.

criterions.comment: hivex package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
